title: Calories in Rice with Chicken
meta_description: Discover calories in rice with chicken for a standard serving, including protein, carbs, fat breakdown, and simple tweaks for variations.
assumptions: 1 serving = 1 cup (158g) cooked white rice + 85g cooked skinless chicken breast, steamed or boiled together, no added oil, salt, or sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by rice type, chicken cut, portion size, cooking method, and added ingredients. Check labels or recipes for precision.

quick_answer.text: One serving of rice with chicken provides ~345 kcal and ~31 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use brown rice instead of white
Add 1 tbsp vegetable oil for stir-frying
Use chicken thigh instead of breast

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of rice with chicken?
faqs.a: Approximately 345 kcal for a plain 1-cup rice and 85g chicken serving.

faqs.q: What's the protein in rice with chicken?
faqs.a: About 31 g protein per serving, mostly from the chicken.

faqs.q: Does rice with chicken have a lot of carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, around 44.5 g carbs per serving, primarily from the rice.

faqs.q: How to reduce calories in rice with chicken?
faqs.a: Use less rice, more veggies, or skinless lean chicken cuts to lower totals.

faqs.q: Is this for fried or plain rice with chicken?
faqs.a: Plain (steamed/boiled); frying adds 100+ kcal from oil.
